entry.title: 登山注意事项
entry.content:
尊敬的客户您好

尊敬的客户，

您好！我是登山公司的客服经理，非常高兴为您提供即将登山的客户服务。首先，我想向您表达最热烈的问候，希望您在接下来的旅程中能够保持愉快和放松的心情。

在登山的准备过程中，我想提醒您注意以下几点：

  1. 确认您的登山装备是否齐全，并按照规定的方式使用和携带。

  2. 根据气候和天气情况，选择合适的服装和鞋子，以确保您的舒适度和安全性。

  3. 在登山前，请确保您的身体状况适宜进行这项运动，如果您有任何健康问题或疑虑，请及时告知我们的教练或工作人员。

  4. 在登山过程中，请遵守所有的规定和指示，并随时保持与我们的教练或工作人员的联系。

为了能够更好地为您提供服务，并确保我们在您需要时能够及时联系到您，请您确认以下联系方式是否正确：

电子邮箱：896324@tsinghua.com

如果您有任何进一步的疑问或需求，请随时联系我们，我们将竭诚为您服务。

最后，我再次祝愿您在登山的过程中度过一段难忘的时光，期待着与您共同度过这次美好的经历。

谢谢！

附表1：登山注意事项

  1. 登山装备：
    • 冲锋衣和冲锋裤：防风、防水、透气性强的衣裤。#
    • 登山靴：具有良好的防滑和隔离性能的高帮靴。
    • 抓钉：用于在冰雪路面上提供额外的抓地力。
    • 手套和帽子：保持手部和头部温暖。
    • 高质量的登山袜：防止起水泡和保持脚部干燥。
    • 雪镜或护目镜：保护眼睛免受强烈紫外线的伤害。
    • 登山杖：提供额外的支撑和平衡。
  2. 睡袋和帐篷：
    • 低温下的睡袋：选择适合极寒环境使用的睡袋。
    • 轻便且耐用的登山帐篷：提供足够的保护和防风性能。
  3. 食品和水：
    • 高能量食品：例如坚果、能量棒、巧克力等。
    • 高海拔适应性食品：可以携带高海拔地区使用的食品，例如能量饮料和脱水食品。
    • 水和水过滤设备：携带足够的水和水过滤设备，确保饮用水源清洁。
  4. 医疗用品：
    • 急救包：包括创可贴、绷带、止血剂、退烧药等。
    • 高原病药物：咨询医生并携带适合您个人情况的高原病药物。
  5. 其他必需品：
    • 头灯：提供便捷的照明。
    • 防晒霜和唇膏：保护皮肤免受强烈紫外线的伤害。
    • 充电设备：携带适配器和备用电池。

附表2：登山注意事项

  1. 提前进行适应训练：登山珠穆朗玛峰是一项极具挑战性的运动，确保您进行足够的体能和耐力训练，以应对高海拔环境。

  2. 了解天气和路况：提前了解登山期间的天气状况和路况，以便做出准确的计划，并做好应对突发情况的准备。

  3. 高原病预防：了解高原病的症状和预防方法，并携带适当的药物，但如果出现严重症状，应立即下撤。

  4. 保持足够的水分摄取：在高海拔环境中，很容易出现脱水症状，因此要确保喝足够的水以保持身体水分平衡。

  5. 严格遵循登山规定：遵循当地登山规定，尊重环境和当地文化，并与当地导游或专业登山队合作，以确保安全。

entry.title: ACE(Avatar Cloud Engine) for Games在UE5中的使用
entry.content:
阅读文章Introducing NVIDIA ACE For Games - Spark Life Into Virtual Characters With Generative AI | GeForce News | NVIDIA后决定实践该技术流程

该模型可以实现与游戏NPC实时对话，具体流程为：

  • 利用NVIDIA’NeMo AI框架结合NPC个人背景生成其“专属台词”
  • 利用NVIDIA’Rica模型进行语音识别和文本转语音
  • 利用NVIDIA’Omniverse Audio2Face功能结合文本驱动数字人面部表情

该模型目前已支持在Unity和UE5中使用，但本人没有在Unity中成功尝试，在此提供在UE5中的使用流程。文末附已知Unity可用流程。

安装插件

下载插件并安装

  • Convai Unreal 插件仅与Unreal Engine 5和4.26 或更高版本兼容

  • 在链接中下载对应版本的插件文件夹 - Google 云端硬盘

  • 找到引擎的插件安装目录UE_5.2>Engine>Plugins

在引擎中激活插件

  • 打开引擎

  • 创建第一人称游戏项目

  • 在编辑中打开插件，搜索convai，勾选后选择立即重启。

  • 找到项目所在文件夹,打开Config/DefaultEngine.ini,在文件顶端增加

  • 保存之后关闭,重新启动引擎

创建定制角色

  • 在网站Loading… (convai.com)注册并登录

  • 点击 create a new character

  • 填写合适的数据，右侧的人物也可以进行形象定制。

  • 记录角色的Character’s ID和API Key，后续在引擎中需要使用。


引擎中导入角色信息

输入API Key

  • 打开引擎，编辑-项目设置-插件-convai
  • 刚才在页面复制的API Key

创建蓝图

  • 右键内容浏览器，创建蓝图类

  • 输入搜索ConvaiBaseCharacter

  • 将蓝图拖拽至场景中

修改蓝图

  • 大纲中找到TestChar，细节-默认更改Char ID

  • 修改Blueprints文件夹中BP_FirstPersonCharacter蓝图

  • 更改类设置中的类选项-父类为ConvaiBasePlayer

  • 目前为止在场景里面可以和NPC正常对话，只是看不到模型，请确保到这一步运行时无bug

导入角色模型

下载模型

  • 打开窗口-Quixel Bridge.

  • 下载喜欢的模型，然后导入

  • 对话框勾选启用缺失

  • 此时引擎提示重启，请按提示重启

角色导入场景

  • 在内容管理器中选择角色对应的文件夹。选择了哪个角色，该文件夹就是什么名字。

  • 将本蓝图类拖入之后场景会出现角色

  • 双击本蓝图类进行编辑

  • 更改类设置中的类选项-父类为Convai Base Character

  • 更改组件-Body-动画-动画类为Convai_MetaHuman_BodyAnim

  • 更改组件-Body-Face-动画-动画类为Convai_MetaHuman_FaceAnim

  • 完成后进行编译，确保没有报错

配置人物

  • 点击场景中的人物，细节-默认-Char ID中粘贴网站复制的ID

到此为止已完成所有配置，可以实现Youtube视频中所展示的效果。

在Unity中使用

适用于windows系统与2019.4LTS以上版本Unity

  • 下载core unity pluginConvaiforUnity-v2023.05.11-core.unitypackage - Google 云端硬盘

  • 下载所需ConvaiforUnity_vX.Y.Z.unitypackage https://convai.com/download/UnityPlugin

  • 按照《创建定制角色》在convai网站中完成操作

  • 导入package与plugin

  • 在edit-ProjectSettings-Player-other Settings取消勾选Assemble Version Validation

  • Convai-Convai Setup中输入API密钥

  • 打开assets-convai-scenes中场景，更改Convai NPC Ellen-Convai NPC (Script)-Character ID角色ID

以下步骤为可能需要

  • 添加插件NPC AI - Dialog, actions and general intelligence - by Convai | AI | Unity Asset Store
  • 添加后在unity打开，download 之后 import
  • 弹出tmp importer的时候只勾选Import TMP Essentials 安装完毕之后直接退出

entry.title: Game Art Analysis of Toem
entry.content:
For the purpose of creating games, I recently played Toem. I’d like to share my thoughts on the distinct art style of Toem. Toem is created by game studio Something We Made which aims to take photographs while exploring the world.

Analysis of the creation method

Everything is black and white

The overall is black and white. Looking at other games on their website, I don’t like their color style. If Toem was like that, I wouldn’t play it.

As a travel photo game, Toem relies heavily on visual effects. The production team uses black and white color matching to avoid the problem of different audiences with different color styles, so as to absorb more aesthetic players. While I’m sure it was easy for the production team to color the map and find the color ratio they liked, there’s no denying that the black and white tones reduced the amount of work needed to control the color of the picture. No need to worry about the saturation of the color, and only need to choose between light and dark, so that the picture is clear.

Model creation

The models in the game try to show the style of splicing objects, but for the sake of workload, the models should still be built in the modeling software, rather than splicing in Unity.

The surface of the model has an obvious hand-painted style, such as irregular shaking strokes or decorative lines, simple childlike model design. Try to keep the shake of the lines when drawing the map, but completely cancel the shake of the edges of square objects and give sharp edges to blocky objects.

In the image below, it is more obvious that some lines were completely sharp, while others were shaken to maintain their hand-painted feel.

Non-model object

All non-model objects in the game have orientation recognition and orientation cameras.

transform.LookAt(targrt);

Stroke objects will be individually traced in unity using shader to make them smoother. This is even more obvious in the image below, where there is a significant distortion, but the edges remain rounded and smooth, thanks to shader stroke.

Handling of different requirements

Plant

Woody plant

For perfectly symmetrical, tower - shaped trees, use face inserts to render. Try to avoid drawing the texture right in the center of the insert. Two colors of detail are used here to show the hierarchy of the tree.

Asymmetrical trees would be modeled, and the game would have chosen the willow tree as a prototype, summed up in a square abstraction. These trees only appear in urban scenes, and they don’t appear in separate pieces. Create variety in the tree by varying the number of blocks.

I personally like the black trunk of this tree, which is bouncing and steady.

Herb

The herbs in the game are of two heights, small crops lying on the ground and plants at the same height as the characters. All herbs use pasta.

Mushroom

If I remember correctly, this is the only mushroom in the game. Each group of mushrooms has the same texture, so the same set of tiles is repeated.

Potted plant

Potted solution is the lower modeling, the upper surface.

For bloated objects that can’t be cubed, the game is represented by this overflow piece, which can be seen as real if you don’t look closely, and it’s used in many places.

Ground

The richness of the ground

Toem is black and white, but the scenes don’t feel hollow. Here I use a forest scene as an example. In the Boy Scout scene, various plant materials are divided into three levels for placement.

  1. Basic ground texture + low ground plants, grass, gravel shadow
  2. High ground plants, thicker grass
  3. Trees and rocks : Pines and rocks

Even in other situations, the formula still holds

The same goes for the scene in the sea.

Texture of the ground

Toem’s floor looks simple but is filled with details.。

The Brick Floor map has two types of bricks and comes with modeling bricks, so a simple brick floor has three elements.

This image shows special brick sides under the lamp posts, line textures on the stairs, and bricks on the walls that are completely different from the floor.

On the tile floor of the runway scene, a closer look will find that the tile edge is distributed with random black edges.

Building type

Toem’s architecture is distinguished by the best wall texture, the best corner material and the best roof design.

Toem made five designs for Windows to prevent a single building.

Details of the chair

Because the proportion of the characters is exaggerated, so the chair in line with the action of the characters is dwarfed.

Our Creations

We analyzed a lot of Toem’s creation methods before production, and applied this flat style to our own creation. But because our model is not a completely cube item, the process is a little more cumbersome.

This is an experimental tree, but it won’t be used because it lacks an original design.

To create the house, a modeling software was used to extend the face and then map the face to achieve the Toem effect. It’s a lot of work, thanks to our 3D art.

entry.title: Toem美术风格分析与实践
entry.content:
最近因为游戏创作的需求去游玩了Toem。我想在这篇博文中分享我对Toem这款游戏独特美术风格的见解，以及我们团队在实践中寻找的美术风格创作方法。该游戏由瑞典游戏工作室“Something We Made”开发，以旅行拍照为游戏目的展开主角对世界的探索。

创作方式分析

整体画面为黑白色调

Toem游戏整体为黑白色调。根据制作组官网的游戏展示，我并不喜欢他们其他游戏的色彩风格，如果Toem也是这种色彩风格我可能不会入坑。

Toem作为一款旅行拍照游戏极度依赖视觉效果，制作组利用黑白配色很好的规避了不同色彩风格受众不同这一问题，达到了吸纳多审美倾向玩家的效果。虽然我相信对制作组来说给贴图上色并找到他们喜欢的色彩比例并不难，但是不可否认黑白色调减少了画面色彩调控的工作量，无需再考虑颜色的饱和度，只需在明暗中进行选择，让画面主次分明。

模型创作

游戏中的模型尽量呈现出片状物体拼接的风格，但出于工作量的考虑，模型应该还是在建模软件中完成搭建的，并非在Unity中使用面片进行拼接。

模型的表面呈很明显的手绘风格，如不规则抖动的描边或修饰线条，简洁童趣的模型设计。在绘制贴图时要尽量保持线条的抖动感，但对于方形物体边缘又完全取消这种抖动感，给块状物体锋利的边缘感。

下图可以更明显的看出制作组对于某些线条的要求是完全锋利，但某些线条又保留抖动来保持其手绘感。

非模型物体

游戏中的非模型物体均带有方向识别和朝向摄像机功能。

transform.LookAt(targrt);

描边物体会在unity中单独使用shader单独描边，使其更加平滑。在下图中更加明显，图像出现了明显的失真，但边缘依然保持圆润的平滑状态，这是通过了shader的描边处理。

不同需求的处理形式

植物

木本植物

对于对称的、塔形的树，使用面片插片来呈现。尽量避免在插片的正中央绘制纹理。这里用两种颜色的细节来表现树的层次感。

不对称的树会采取建模的方式，游戏应该是选择了柳树作为原型，用方形抽象概括。这种树只出现在了城市场景中，并且不成片出现，各自独立。用改变方块数量的方式制造树的多样性。

我本人很喜欢这种树的黑色树干，跳脱又沉稳。

草本植物

游戏中的草本植物有两种高度，趴伏在地上的小作物和与人物同等高度的植物。草本植物全部使用面片。

菌类

如果我没记错的话，这是游戏里出现的唯一一种蘑菇。每组蘑菇纹理相同，所以是同一组贴图重复摆放。

盆栽

盆栽的解决方式是下部建模，上部面片。

对于无法方块化的膨胀物体，游戏用这种溢出的插片来表现，不细看的话已经以假乱真，这种方式运用在了很多地方。

地面

地面的丰盈感

Toem虽然是黑白游戏，但场景不会让人感到空洞。在这里我以一个森林场景来举例。在童子军场景中，各种植物素材分成了三个层次进行摆放，

  1. 基础的地面纹理+低矮的地面植物，小草、碎石阴影
  2. 有高度的地面植物，更茂密的草
  3. 树和岩石：松树和岩石

即是换到了其他场景，这套公式也依然存在

海里的场景也一样。

地面的纹理

Toem的地面看似简单实则细节加满。

砖块地面贴图有两种砖块，还附带了建模砖块，所以简单的砖块地面上面有三种元素。

这张图可以看到灯柱下有专门的砖块围边，楼梯口有线条纹理，墙壁上的砖块和地面完全不一样。

走秀场景的瓷砖地面，细看会发现瓷砖边分布着随机黑边。

建筑类型

Toem的建筑从墙体纹理、拐角材质、房顶设计几个方面进行区分。

Toem对窗户进行了5种设计，防止楼体单一。

椅子的细节

因为人物比例进行了夸张化，所以符合人物动作的椅子被进行了矮化。

我们的创作

我们在制作之前大量分析了Toem的创作方式，并把这种扁平化的风格运用到自己的创作中。但因为我们的模型并非完全方块化的物品，所以流程更麻烦一些。

这是实验效果中的树，但不会最终使用，因为它缺少原创的设计。

创作这种房屋需要在建模软件中先延伸面片再对面片进行贴图绘制，达到Toem的效果。这是一项繁琐的工作，感谢我们的3D美术。

entry.title: Book review for The god of time that brings out the maximum performance of the brain by a Japanese psychiatrist Kabasawa Shion
entry.content:
One of the most practical books that I have read this week is 脳のパフォーマンスを最大まで引き出す 神・時間術 by a Japanese psychiatrist 樺沢 紫苑. This book talks about how we can manage time from a scientific perspective. Here are some highlights I want to emphasize for you.

The best schedule of the day.

  • 7am-9am is an efficient time.

    • Sleep without closing the curtains.

    • Clear your head with a shower and slow breakfast munching.

    • Make today’s to-do list and highlight the two most significant things.

  • 9am-12pm is work time.

    • Choose a tomato clock based on the level of focus required for the job.
    • Answering emails and exercising can be used during breaks to improve focus.

  • 12pm-1pm is lunch break time.

    • Stress can be relieved by visiting various restaurants or trying new dishes.

    • Sleep for 20 or 30 minutes.

  • 1pm-4pm is an inefficient working time.

    • Change the work scene.
    • Sleep for a few minutes during the break.

  • 4pm-6pm is sprint time.

    • Finish the to-do list before leaving work.

  • 6pm-7pm is sport time.

    • Exercise and take advantage of fragmented time to read.

  • 8pm-10pm is a second efficient time or relax time.

  • Sleep before 11pm and think about the most interesting thing that happened today.

How to relax in relaxation time?

  • Make a clear distinction between work and home.

    • Don’t let stress and exhaustion stay overnight.
    • Forget about work when you leave the company.

  • Communication is the most effective way to relax.

    • Enjoy dinner and a movie with your family.
    • Watch a competition with friends and have a drink.

  • Use your non-visual senses.

    • Listen to the music.
    • Smell the aroma.
    • Hot baths, saunas and massages.
    • Pet your pet.
    • Light exercise.

  • Before you go to bed, think of an interesting story that happened today.

How to work efficiently

  • Mute the electronic equipment. Once concentration is interrupted, it takes at least 15 minutes to return to its original state.

  • Write down everything that’s on your mind. By accepting that this has already been done, the brain avoids anxiety.

  • Initial effort and final effort are the two peaks of productivity. You can increase your concentration by taking appropriate breaks from work.

  • Schedule your evenings with activities that interest you. If we have an upcoming appointment in the evening, we can focus on our work and leave early to meet it.

  • Make decisions at fragmented times. Such as time to go to the bathroom, time to get from home to the subway station, time to get on the subway and time to get off.

entry.title: Some insights from Robert de Board's Counselling for Toads: A Psychological Adventure
entry.content:
Before reading Counselling for Toads: A Psychological Adventure,I read Alfred Adler’s What Life Should Mean to You which states how deeply the childhood can affect us. In Robert’s book,I learned more details about views in the form of animal perspectives.

A life axis

When we’re four or five years old, we try to ask ourselves two questions:

  • Am I well-bing?
  • Are others well-being?

Different answers will build a life axis.

I’m fine.I’m not fine.
You’re fine.Zone AZone B
You’re not fine.Zone CZone D

When we are in Zone B,we’ll fall into a spiral of inferiority. We’re going to play a PLOM(poor little old me). We hope that no matter what we do, we will be loved and respected by others.

When we are in Zone C, we think we have power and authority in our pockets. We used to saying why do you always disappoint me and how dare you?

Eventually,Zone A is a brave choice.

There are also references to the self-states of children, adults and parents, which is a good way to clarify yourself. But I think one of the things that helped me a lot in the book was the idea of looking at the state of the self as an outsider.

Genuinely respond to the needs of the present

In fact, we don’t have to secretly or unconsciously cooperate with others to create unhappiness. How long are we going to blame others for our unhappiness? We should live a real life, sincerely respond to the needs of the moment, and find the real self, in order to break the causal cycle brought by childhood and free ourselves from the shackles of past experiences.

Self-testify prophecy

Sometimes we get used to using self-corroborating prophecies to control events in advance to make sure they come true. Through this process, we assume the feelings of others and assign blame to ourselves. No criticism is stronger than self-criticism, and no judge is more critical than ourselves. But we need to make the transition from blame to responsibility, realizing that we have the power to change the situation and ourselves.

It may be harsh to say, Toad, but the only person who can help you is you and only you. There are many questions you need to ask yourself. Can you stop being self-critical? Can you be kind to yourself? Perhaps the most important question is, can you begin to love yourself?
